medical_history.chief_complaint: Nausea, vomiting, diarrhea, and abdominal pain.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms of vomiting and diarrhea began with multiple episodes. Abdominal pain started as constant over the past 1 day, worsening in the right lower quadrant. No blood was noted in vomit or stool. Symptoms had no aggravating or relieving factors specified.
